name: Private Chat
description: PRVT.CHAT is a privacy-first, decentralized communication protocol on Solana, engineered to secure the Web3 era's messaging layer. Leveraging zero-knowledge compression from Light Protocol, PRVT.CHAT enables verifiable, high-efficiency end-to-end encrypted messaging, group chats, and file sharing with only encrypted data stored immutably on-chain. The $PRVT token powers this infrastructure, granting access to premium features like private cross-platform messaging sessions, decentralized domain identities (e.g., hello.prvt), and integrated Social Payments. PRVT.CHAT solves the inherent privacy vs. transparency dilemma of public blockchains, offering a solution-oriented, future-ready standard for confidential digital interaction.
